sentences.english: He told his troubles to every Tom, Dick and Harry.
sentences.chinese: 他见人就诉说自己的烦恼，不论张三，抑或李四。

sentences.english: That eagle might be a hatchling, or simply snuggling inside the shell.
sentences.chinese: 它也许只是只雏鹰，抑或还依偎在蛋壳之中。

sentences.english: Does such an administration operate within the political system, or supplant it?
sentences.chinese: 这种管治是在既有政制中运作，抑或另起炉灶？

sentences.english: Or is it just one of 72 fake graves built by the suspicious Cao Cao?
sentences.chinese: 抑或生性多疑的曹操真有七十二疑冢？

sentences.english: What kind of spiritual clothes are you wearing – the old or the new?
sentences.chinese: 你身上还是穿着旧人，抑或已换上新人呢？

sentences.english: Or dry fry (without any oil) in a non-stick skillet until browned and slightly crisp.
sentences.chinese: 抑或烧热不沾锅，无油将其炒至金黄香脆。

sentences.english: Try to influence the person who has prejudice about you or the person who ever bluffed you.
sentences.chinese: 适当的去感化对你有偏见的人，抑或是欺骗过你的人。

sentences.english: Or will MMV just cease to exist.
sentences.chinese: 抑或摩托罗拉移动风险投资将不复存在？

sentences.english: I could worry about what it will bring, or what could go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我可以担心明天会发生什么，抑或有什么会出错。

sentences.english: If I should meet thee, After long years, How should I greet thee?
sentences.chinese: 多年离别后，抑或再相逢，相逢何所语？

sentences.english: Or, you look in the mirror and your teeth are all missing.
sentences.chinese: 抑或你一照镜子发现你的牙全都不见了。

sentences.english: Or would a free ticket have  destroyed your  motivation?
sentences.chinese: 抑或这张免费票会抹杀你的奋斗动机？

sentences.english: Or those legendary waves treading or clouds driving people in mythology?
sentences.chinese: 还是神话传说中那些踏浪抑或腾云驾雾的人物？

sentences.english: Or so is the reality the sun evaporated, a bit not left.
sentences.chinese: 抑或就这么被现实的烈阳蒸发掉了，点滴不剩。

sentences.english: Or a baby might be born with developmental defects.
sentences.chinese: 抑或可能会使婴儿天生发育不全。

definition: whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
not to be concerned/regardless of/no matter
so much so that/to the extent that/even
in the end/after all is said and done
